courseSections.title: Rocket Engineering 101
courseSections.description: Master the fundamentals of rocket design and propulsion systems in this comprehensive introductory course.

courseSections.title: Space Navigation and Orbital Mechanics
courseSections.description: Learn the intricacies of plotting courses through the cosmos and understanding the complex dance of celestial bodies.

courseSections.title: Advanced Materials in Aerospace
courseSections.description: Explore cutting-edge materials and their applications in spacecraft and aircraft construction.
